SUGGESTIONS.TITLE: Try asking about:
ITEMS: What are my top performing routes?
Which orders experienced the most delays?
How can I optimize my delivery costs?
What patterns do you see in my logistics data?

RESPONSES.PERFORMANCE: Based on your logistics data, I can see several performance patterns. Your average delivery time is {{time}} days, with {{percentage}}% of orders delivered on time. The most efficient routes are those serving {{regions}}.
RESPONSES.COSTS: Your cost analysis shows total logistics expenses of {{cost}}. The average cost per order is {{avgCost}}, with the highest costs typically associated with {{factors}}.
RESPONSES.DELAYS: Delay analysis indicates a {{rate}}% delay rate across all shipments. The average delay duration is {{duration}} days, with peak delays occurring during {{periods}}.
RESPONSES.ROUTES: Your route optimization data shows {{routeCount}} active routes with an average efficiency of {{efficiency}}%. The most cost-effective routes are {{topRoutes}}.
RESPONSES.DEFAULT: I'd be happy to help you analyze your logistics data! I can provide insights on performance metrics, cost analysis, delay patterns, and route optimization. What specific aspect would you like to explore?

ERRORS.FILE_TOO_LARGE: File is too large. Maximum size is 50MB.
ERRORS.INVALID_FORMAT: Invalid file format. Please upload CSV or Excel files.
ERRORS.NETWORK_ERROR: Network error. Please check your connection.
ERRORS.GENERIC_ERROR: An error occurred. Please try again.
